thread.title: Erin Curtis
thread.title_full: Mainely Urns reviewed by Erin Curtis

author: Erin Curtis
title: Erin Curtis
text: I made my fathers Urn. It is a personal expression of my love and respect for him. Naturally I wanted something equally beautiful for the base. I am so pleased with the quality and look of the base and equally pleased with the engraved base plate. I think he would be very happy and proud of the way it looks.
